thread.section_title: Lyft Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lyft | www.lyft.com
thread.title: Lyft driver Brianna
thread.title_full: Lyft reviewed by Lyft driver Brianna

author: Lyft driver Brianna
title: Lyft driver Brianna
text: Convenient for drivers to turn app on and work and stop when they want. I make extra money by working mostly weekend nights and some week shifts when I'm not at my other job. My only issue, which may not even be Lyft's fault, is that sometimes my Lyft app won't show a route to get to a passenger and/or their destination. So I basically have to wing it. Luckily I know my way around San Diego pretty well.
